member.name: T:Xoqal.Presentation.Commands.RelayCommand
member.summary: A command whose sole purpose is to relay its functionality to other objects by invoking delegates. The default return value for the CanExecute method is 'true'.

member.name: M:Xoqal.Presentation.Commands.RelayCommand.#ctor(System.Action)
member.summary: Creates a new command that can always execute.

member.name: M:Xoqal.Presentation.Commands.RelayCommand.#ctor(System.Action,System.Func{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Creates a new command.

member.name: M:Xoqal.Presentation.Commands.RelayCommand.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method that determines whether the command can execute in its current state.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.
member.returns: true if this command can be executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Xoqal.Presentation.Commands.RelayCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method to be called when the command is invoked.

member.name: M:Xoqal.Presentation.Converters.AndConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts source values to a value for the binding target. The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates the values from source bindings to the binding target.
member.param: The array of values that the source bindings in the produces. The value indicates that the source binding has no value to provide for conversion.
The type of the binding target property.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value.If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.A return value of . indicates that the converter did not produce a value, and that the binding will use the if it is available, or else will use the default value.A return value of . indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or the default value.

member.name: M:Xoqal.Presentation.Converters.AndConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a binding target value to the source binding values.
member.param: The value that the binding target produces.
The array of types to convert to. The array length indicates the number and types of values that are suggested for the method to return.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: An array of values that have been converted from the target value back to the source values.
